backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with booking, provider, rental, and user profile types plus storage maps and authorization/storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Implements migration logic converting old actor state types into updated provider and user profile structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the React router, query client, and routes for all service, booking, provider, profile, and rental pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with an icon and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wraps content and shows a login prompt card when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Shows a styled badge representing a booking's status based on predefined variants.
Clickable EYEGIC logo component with adjustable styling variants.
frontend/src/components/forms/Availabili: Selects single or ranged dates with time inputs and outputs a formatted availability string.
frontend/src/components/forms/MockOtpVer: Mock OTP flow for phone or email, including generating, verifying, resending, and showing status.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Optional image upload with preview and remove controls, emitting selected file changes.
frontend/src/components/icons/WhatsAppIc: SVG component rendering a WhatsApp icon.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Page wrapper providing configurable max-width and optional title/description header.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, navigation links, contact buttons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation, contact options, authentication buttons, and profile completion display.
frontend/src/components/profile/FrameSha: Exports SVG icon components for various eyeglass frame shapes.
Renders a checkbox list of frame shape options using icons and manages selection state.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates an optician booking and invalidates customer bookings on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking and invalidates customer bookings on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking and invalidates customer bookings on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Retrieves bookings for the current customer using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Retrieves bookings assigned to a provider using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates the status of a booking and refreshes related booking queries.
Empty placeholder file for site logo hook.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useCallerUser: Fetches the caller's user profile with loading state tied to actor readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfileCom: Gets the user profile completion percentage from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useProfilePic: Provides mutations to update profile and prescription pictures and refresh profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/profile/useSaveCaller: Saves the caller's user profile and invalidates profile-related queries.
Fetches provider details for the authenticated identity.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Loads the rental catalog items from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, theme variables, and utility classes for layout and form components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Booking detail page that fetches a specific booking and displays its information, status, and related metadata.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Displays confirmation details for a mobile optician booking, handles loading and missing booking states.
Form page to create a mobile optician booking with service selection, validation, pricing, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Lists the logged‑in user's bookings with status, scheduling, and navigation to individual booking details.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Shows confirmed rental booking details with pricing breakdown and navigation options.
Form to book an eyewear rental, selecting rental duration, address, and submitting to create a booking.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Displays confirmation and details of a repair request, including service fee and booking status.
Form for submitting an eyewear repair request with optional details, photo, and preferred date.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page UI displaying hero content, service listings, and a how‑it‑works section with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/profile/MyProfilePage: User profile edit page handling personal info, frame preferences, and uploading profile or prescription pictures.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing provider info, booking list, and allowing booking status updates.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Provider registration form with validation, service selection, and phone/email verification.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Displays details for a rental item including pricing, availability, and product features.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Rental catalog page with search, category filtering, and item list navigation.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Marketing page describing mobile optician services with features and booking button.
React page showing eyewear rental features, benefits, and a button to navigate to the rentals catalog.
React page highlighting repair services, listing service types, and linking to the repair booking flow.
frontend/src/pages/settings/BrandingLogo: Empty file placeholder for branding logo settings page.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides INR formatting helpers with and without a trailing slash.
frontend/src/utils/logoDataUrl.ts: Empty utility file intended for logo data URL handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence support.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validation helpers for phone numbers, email, and PIN code formatting with normalization.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, and current app status.
